priorities.title: Create G2 Agency Profile
priorities.description: G2 is heavily cited by LLMs for 'best agency' queries
priorities.action: Create G2 profile at g2.com/products/new, add company info, request reviews from 5-10 existing clients

priorities.title: Issue Press Release via GlobeNewswire
priorities.description: ChatGPT prioritizes wire service press releases
priorities.action: Issue press release about Inc. 5000 2025 recognition with specific metrics (428% growth, revenue, client count)

priorities.title: Submit to Agency Ranking Lists
priorities.description: Both ChatGPT and Gemini heavily cite these sources
priorities.action: Submit to DesignRush, Clutch, Amra and Elma agency directories

priorities.title: Build Wikipedia Article
priorities.description: Foundational for knowledge graph presence across all LLMs
priorities.action: Compile notability evidence from Inc. 5000 recognition and submit article

priorities.title: Pursue Industry Publication Coverage
priorities.description: Target AdExchanger, Marketing Brew, Retail Dive
priorities.action: Pitch thought leadership on retail media trends

critical: No Wikipedia article - blocks knowledge graph citations
No G2 profile - major gap for 'best agency' queries
No industry publication coverage (AdExchanger, Marketing Brew)
No press releases on wire services
gaps.impact: Without Wikipedia and G2, Voyageur Group cannot be cited as authoritative source by LLMs for category queries
